contentDescription.name: contentDescription
contentDescription.prettyName: Content description (Not applicable for "No content" type)

property.code:
{{velocity}} ########################################################## ## DISPLAY QUIZ MACRO ## -------------------------------- ## ## Authors: Zoubir Medjdoub ## ########################################################## ## Using a simple local variable for formating localization #set($local = $services.localization) #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('XQuizCode.DisplayQuizMacro')) #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('XQuizCode.DisplayQuizMacro')) #set($quiz = $xcontext.macro.params.quiz) #set($quizDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($quiz)) ## --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ## List the questions of quiz ## --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- #set($questions = $quizDoc.getObjects('XQuizCode.QuestionClass')) {{html wiki="false" clean="false"}} #if($questions.size()>0)

$quizDoc.display('quizTitle')

## Init the correct Answers var #set($correctAnswers = "" ) #foreach($quest in $questions) ## ------------------ ## Question container ## ------------------
${velocityCount}. $quest.get('questionTitle')
    #foreach($i in [1..5]) #displayAnswerLine($quest "answer${i}") #end
#if($foreach.hasNext) #set($correctAnswers = "${correctAnswers}'$!quest.get('correctAnswer')',") #else #set($correctAnswers = "${correctAnswers}'$!quest.get('correctAnswer')'") #end
## ------------------ #end
$local.render('xquiz.displayquizmacro.selectoption')
$local.render('xquiz.displayquizmacro.yourresultbtn')
## Init the current Quiz #else #info($local.render('xquiz.displayquizmacro.noquiz')) #end ## Macro to display an answer line #macro(displayAnswerLine $quest $answerId) #if("$!quest.get($answerId)" != "") #set($answer = $escapetool.html($!quest.getProperty($answerId).getValue()))##
    • #end #end {{/html}} {{/velocity}}

property.description: This macro is used to display a quiz on a wiki page
The doc fullName of quiz to display
